Class Jackut

java.lang.Object
br.ufal.ic.p2.jackut.Jackut
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Jackut extends Object implements Serializable
Main class of the Jackut system, responsible for managing users, sessions, friendships, and messages. This class acts as the system's interface, interacting with the Repository. Implements Serializable to support system persistence.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Jackut

      public Jackut()
      Constructs a new Jackut instance. Initializes the system repository.

  • Method Details

    • resetSystem

      public void resetSystem()
      Resets the system, erasing all stored data.

    • getUserAttribute

      public String getUserAttribute(String login, String attribute) throws EmptyAttributeException, UserNotFoundException
      Gets a specific user attribute.
      Parameters:
      login - The user's login
      attribute - The attribute name to retrieve
      Returns:
      The attribute value
      Throws:
      EmptyAttributeException - If the attribute is empty
      UserNotFoundException - If the user doesn't exist

    • createUser

      public void createUser(String login, String password, String name) throws UserAlreadyExistsException, InvalidLoginException, InvalidPasswordException
      Creates a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      login - The user's login
      password - The user's password
      name - The user's name
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyExistsException - If the user already exists
      InvalidLoginException - If the login is invalid
      InvalidPasswordException - If the password is invalid

    • newSession

      public String newSession(String login, String password) throws UserNotFoundException, InvalidPasswordOrLoginException
      Creates a new session for a user.
      Parameters:
      login - The user's login
      password - The user's password
      Returns:
      The new session ID
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user doesn't exist
      InvalidPasswordOrLoginException - If the credentials are invalid

    • isFriend

      public boolean isFriend(String login, String friend) throws UserNotFoundException
      Checks if two users are friends.
      Parameters:
      login - The first user's login
      friend - The friend's login
      Returns:
      true if they are friends, false otherwise
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If either user doesn't exist

    • addFriend

      public void addFriend(String userSessionId, String friendLogin) throws UserNotFoundException, AlreadyFriendException, WaitingToAcceptException, CantAddItselfException, InvalidFunctionEnemyException
      Adds a friend to a user.
      Parameters:
      userSessionId - The user's session ID
      friendLogin - The friend's login
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If either user doesn't exist
      AlreadyFriendException - If they are already friends
      WaitingToAcceptException - If there's a pending friend request
      CantAddItselfException - If trying to add self as friend
      InvalidFunctionEnemyException - If trying to add an enemy

    • endSystem

      public void endSystem()
      Saves all data and shuts down the system.

    • editProfile

      public void editProfile(String id, String attribute, String value) throws UserNotFoundException, EmptyAttributeException
      Edits a user's profile.
      Parameters:
      id - The user's session ID
      attribute - The attribute to edit
      value - The new attribute value
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user doesn't exist
      EmptyAttributeException - If the attribute is invalid

    • getFriends

      public String getFriends(String login)
      Gets a user's friends list.
      Parameters:
      login - The user's login
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing friends list

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String sessionId, String receiverLogin, String message) throws InvalidFunctionEnemyException, UserNotFoundException, CantMessageItselfException
      Sends a message to another user.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The sender's session ID
      receiverLogin - The recipient's login
      message - The message content
      Throws:
      InvalidFunctionEnemyException - If messaging an enemy
      UserNotFoundException - If either user doesn't exist
      CantMessageItselfException - If trying to message self

    • getFirstMessage

      public String getFirstMessage(String sessionId) throws UserNotFoundException, NoMessagesException
      Gets the first message in a user's inbox.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The user's session ID
      Returns:
      The message content
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user doesn't exist
      NoMessagesException - If there are no messages

    • createCommunity

      public void createCommunity(String sessionId, String name, String description) throws UserNotFoundException, CommunityAlreadyExistsException
      Creates a new community.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The creator's session ID
      name - The community name
      description - The community description
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the creator doesn't exist
      CommunityAlreadyExistsException - If the community already exists

    • addMemberToCommunity

      public void addMemberToCommunity(String session, String communityName) throws UserNotFoundException, CommunityDoesntExistException, UserAlreadyCommunityMemberException
      Adds a member to a community.
      Parameters:
      session - The new member's session ID
      communityName - The community name
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user doesn't exist
      CommunityDoesntExistException - If the community doesn't exist
      UserAlreadyCommunityMemberException - If the user is already a member

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage(String sessionId) throws UserNotFoundException, NoMessagesException, NoCommunityMessagesException
      Gets the first community message for a user.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The user's session ID
      Returns:
      The message content
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user doesn't exist
      NoMessagesException - If there are no private messages
      NoCommunityMessagesException - If there are no community messages

    • sendCommunityMessage

      public void sendCommunityMessage(String sessionId, String communityName, String message) throws UserNotFoundException, CommunityDoesntExistException
      Sends a message to a community.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The sender's session ID
      communityName - The community name
      message - The message content
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the sender doesn't exist
      CommunityDoesntExistException - If the community doesn't exist

    • isFan

      public boolean isFan(String fanLogin, String idolLogin) throws UserNotFoundException
      Checks if a user is a fan of another user.
      Parameters:
      fanLogin - The fan's login
      idolLogin - The idol's login
      Returns:
      true if the fan follows the idol, false otherwise
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If either user doesn't exist

    • follow

      public void follow(String userId, String idolLogin) throws UserNotFoundException, SelfFanException, InvalidFunctionEnemyException
      Makes a user follow another user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The follower's session ID
      idolLogin - The idol's login
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If either user doesn't exist
      SelfFanException - If trying to follow self
      InvalidFunctionEnemyException - If trying to follow an enemy

    • getFollowers

      public String getFollowers(String userLogin) throws UserNotFoundException
      Gets a user's followers.
      Parameters:
      userLogin - The user's login
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing followers list
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user doesn't exist

    • isCrush

      public boolean isCrush(String userId, String crushLogin) throws UserNotFoundException
      Checks if a user has a crush on another user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user's session ID
      crushLogin - The crush's login
      Returns:
      true if the crush exists, false otherwise
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If either user doesn't exist

    • addCrush

      public void addCrush(String userId, String crushLogin) throws UserNotFoundException, AlreadyCrushException, CrushItselfException, InvalidFunctionEnemyException
      Adds a crush relationship between users.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user's session ID
      crushLogin - The crush's login
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If either user doesn't exist
      AlreadyCrushException - If the crush already exists
      CrushItselfException - If trying to add self as crush
      InvalidFunctionEnemyException - If trying to add an enemy as crush

    • getCrushes

      public String getCrushes(String userId) throws UserNotFoundException
      Gets a user's crushes.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user's session ID
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing crushes list
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user doesn't exist

    • addEnemy

      public void addEnemy(String sessionId, String enemyLogin) throws UserNotFoundException, AlreadyEnemyException, SelfEnemyException
      Adds an enemy relationship between users. Enemies cannot add each other as friends, crushes, or fans. Messages from enemies are automatically discarded.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The user's session ID
      enemyLogin - The enemy's login
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If either user doesn't exist
      AlreadyEnemyException - If they are already enemies
      SelfEnemyException - If trying to add self as enemy

    • removeUser

      public void removeUser(String userId) throws UserNotFoundException
      Removes a user account from the system. All user information is deleted: relationships, sent messages, profile.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user's session ID
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user doesn't exist
